ComicInfo.Summary:
As the story takes a turn, the secret origins of Colonel Weird and Anti-God begin to unfold and the war between universes explained in this essential story to the Black Hammer universe.
Black Hammer: The End is the next era of the Black Hammer Universe; a six-issue event series by Jeff Lemire and Malachi Ward that pulls the Black Hammer world into crisis.
